function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hospital-acquired infections from smear-positive HIV patients with pulmonary TB","Impact":"Spread of contagious disease, increased risk to patients and staff","Mitigation":"Use of infection control protocols, isolation, and personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"UV-Light, Ionizers, Ventilation systems","People":"Patients, hospital staff, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control team"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air mixing in patient wards","Impact":"Poor air quality, increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of ventilation systems, improvement of air circulation, use of filtration systems","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, Air filters, Airflow monitoring","People":"Patients, hospital staff, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, maintenance team"},{"Description":"Inadequate animal ethical approval and supervision","Impact":"Ethical concerns, risk to animal welfare, potential legal consequences","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to ethical guidelines, oversight by veterinary professionals, ethical training for researchers","Technologies":"Ethical approval protocols, Animal welfare monitoring systems","People":"Research team, veterinary professionals","Owner":"Institutional Review Boards, Veterinary Faculty"}]}
